title: [1.15.2——1.12.2][永久更新][BloodCraft 血迹工艺][5.1.4]——感受血的工艺！
author: 猫客
txt_content:
本帖最后由 猫客 于 2020-6-14 01:52 编辑 

介绍信息：《 Bloodcraft 5》旨在获得最佳装备，并努力争取与全能BOSS作战的血统。 这个mod增加了一些新物品和操作武器，新MOB，5个新BOSS，2个新世界和两个新生物群系。 这个mod有时会很困难，但是一旦您获得了所有必要的工具，您将能够杀死游戏中的任何东西并成为最强者。它具有380多个Mod元素，并且还在不断增长。
作者原文:Info: Bloodcraft 5 is about getting the best gear possible and going to the blood dimension to fight the all-seeing boss. This mod adds some new items and op weapons, new mobs,5 new bosses, 2 new worlds, and two New biome. This mod can be difficult at times but once you get all the tools necessary you will be able to kill anything in the game and be the strongest. you can give us your feedback and maybe will add your item or mob to the mod. you can keep up with the new updates on the BloodCraft Facebook discord or team website. Also if you do find any bugs please do report them on our discord or in the comments. This has 380+ Mod elements and growing.

版本的更新日志大佬能看的更新日志：Update 1.4 : 6 days agoJun 7th+Added loot table for all seeing

-Fixed bloodfuser giving the player the wrong item when fusing
-Killing the all seeing will now drop more Rewards for the player
-Zombie Mods will now only spawn in the dead land biome
-Fixed Some spelling for some item and tools

and fixed some other minor bugs

1.0.1 : 5 months agoJan 16thchangelog 1.0.1

+added Emerald armor
+added New Textures

This is the final update of this mod. We are no longer adding more items to this mod. It has been fun building this mod from the roots up. This mod wouldn't be as far as it is now without you. The only exception to the updates are if there are needs for bug fixes. Nevertheless it's been quite a journey and we hope to see you all in the next project. Thank You. ​ -The Bloodcraft Team

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
发帖前请仔细阅读大区版规和发帖细则
2-2-e
机翻        主题帖发布内容包含机器翻译
酌情 扣分/警告/倒扣/联系整改/关闭或删除/禁言/晒尸7-2-a Mod发布帖
标题格式：
([BGM])+[高版本号-低版本号]+[Mod本名——Mod译名]+([Mcreator制作])+其他
[版本号] ：Mod支持的所有Minecraft版本，例：[1.14.4-1.7.10]，若仅支持某个0.1阶段全版本亦可写作[#.#.X] 例：[1.14.X]
[Mod本名] ：即 Mod 作者公开的 Mod 官方名称
[Mod译名] ：请参考《Minecraft Mod简体中文翻译规范与指南》07
[Mcreator制作]：如为使用Mod制作器 Mcreator 制作的 Mod，请在标题中间规定位置添加此项
机翻导致句意不顺 请勿使用机翻
贴内如有自动播放bgm请在标题前加上"[BGM]"
版本号之间用“-”而不是“——”
“[永久更新]”请放在名称方框后面
中英文名称间用“——”连接
请在修改完成后回复我移回主版块
